description: This table cotains the enrollment information for a care plan.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the care plan record.

columns.name: CP_ENROLL_WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item store the Care Companion workflow from where this care plan was applied to the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


BestPractice Advisory


Reporting Workbench


Self-Enrollment


Care Plan Activity


Extension

columns.name: ALERT_CSN_ID
columns.description: BestPractice Advisory ALT CSN used to enroll the patient in the care plan.

columns.name: SIGNUP_MYPT_ID
columns.description: MyChart user ID who enrolled the patient in the care plan.

columns.name: PREG_SELF_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Pregnancy episode ID (HSB) associated with the self-enrolled care plan.

columns.name: ENROLLING_USER_ID
columns.description: User who enrolled the patient in the care plan.

columns.name: SURGICAL_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Patient CSN linked to the surgical encounter where the enrollment was done
